helpTab.a1: Click the "Connect" button to start a session. When the avatar indicates it's listening, speak your command. You can now interrupt the assistant at any time by simply speaking again.
helpTab.q2: How do I get and set up API Keys?

a2.weatherSteps:
1. Go to the <1>Visual Crossing Weather Data</1> website.
2. Click "Sign Up" to create a free account.
3. After signing in, navigate to your Account page from the top-right menu.
4. Your API Key will be visible on this page. Copy it.
a2.youtubeSteps:
1. Go to the <1>Google Cloud Console</1>.
2. Create a new project (or select an existing one).
3. In the search bar, find and enable the "YouTube Data API v3".
4. Go to "APIs & Services" > "Credentials".
5. Click "+ CREATE CREDENTIALS" and select "API key".
6. Your new API key will be displayed. Copy it.
a2.inputTitle: Where do I input the keys?
a2.inputSteps:
1. In this app, go to Settings ⚙️ > API Keys.
2. Paste your copied key into the corresponding input field.
3. Click the "Save All Keys" button.
